content:encoded:
Case Closed starts off with Sherlock Holmes and The Adventure Of The Maltree Abbey, his story from March 31, 1947.

(29:48) Our second story is The Hanging Judge Murder Case, from Mr. Chameleon. This episode was originally aired September 21, 1949.

Download CaseClosed756

If you enjoy this program every week and would like to help support it, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you to all who’ve helped out over the last 14 years!
